apihelp-parser-migration-summary: Parse a page with two different parser configurations.
apihelp-parser-migration-param-title: The title of the page to load and parse.
apihelp-parser-migration-param-config: The parser configuration to use. May be "old", "new" or "old|new".
apihelp-parser-migration-param-redirect: Redirects are followed by default. Use "no" to not follow redirects.
apihelp-parser-migration-paramvalue-conf: Parses the page using the "new" configuration; Parsoid
Parses the page using the "old" configuration; MediaWiki's legacy parser
